page.title: 02Mr P. A Retired Resident.
page.content: Mr P.age 80yrs, was born in Needing_ worth,left school at 13yrs and worked in farming all his life.He has no sib_ lings or children but many other relatives who live nearby and some in America and Canada.He likes this area and the people and thinks that there are enough facilities here for him but not for younger people. The biggest change Mr P.has experienc_ ed was the changeover from horsepower to powered engines.As for the present, he feels, even with high unemployment, people are still better off than years ago.He thinks that people become more dissatisfied because they see others getting even more.He enjoys all modern facilities and likes to go out for a drive in his car with his wife.They like to shop locally to support the village but shop at St Ives and Bar Hill occasionally.
